futuristic_settings.name: Cyberpunk Megacity
futuristic_settings.description: Dense neon high-rises, perpetual rain, holographic ads, crowded alleyways buzzing with augmented citizens.

futuristic_settings.name: Solarpunk Floating Arcology
futuristic_settings.description: Lush sky gardens, solar sails, wind turbines, glass skybridges linking biophilic towers in bright daylight.

futuristic_settings.name: Orbital Ring Marketplace
futuristic_settings.description: Massive ring station above clouds, microgravity stalls, panoramic planet views, shuttles docking along the rim.

futuristic_settings.name: Zero-G Research Habitat
futuristic_settings.description: Laboratories in microgravity, tethered scientists, floating equipment, stark white modules with luminous panels.

futuristic_settings.name: Submerged Bioluminescent Metropolis
futuristic_settings.description: Glass-domed underwater city, glowing plankton streets, manta-shaped transports, deep-sea blues and greens.

futuristic_settings.name: Martian Colony Biodome
futuristic_settings.description: Red-dust horizon, geodesic domes, hydroponic farms, pressure suits, twilight skies with twin moons.

futuristic_settings.name: Quantum Computing Shrine
futuristic_settings.description: Crystalline caverns housing qubit arrays, shimmering light corridors, monks tending humming cores.

futuristic_settings.name: AI-Governed Utopian Plaza
futuristic_settings.description: Holographic flora, transparent walkways, autonomous helpers, serene crowds under adaptive climate canopies.

futuristic_settings.name: Mech Hangar Cathedral
futuristic_settings.description: Vaulted steel halls, towering mechs on gantries, warning strobes, crews welding beneath stained glass LEDs.

futuristic_settings.name: Desert Drone Caravan
futuristic_settings.description: Mobile modular homes in sandy expanse, escort drones overhead, solar canopies, mirage heat haze.

ancient_eras.name: Ancient Roman Empire
ancient_eras.description: Marble forums, legion standards, togas and laurel wreaths, aqueducts arching across sunlit hills.

ancient_eras.name: Ancient Greek City-State
ancient_eras.description: Whitewashed temples, columned agoras, hoplite armor, olive groves and coastal amphitheaters.

ancient_eras.name: Ancient Egypt
ancient_eras.description: Pyramids and obelisks, hieroglyphic walls, gold jewelry, linen robes along the Nile.

ancient_eras.name: Feudal Japan (Sengoku)
ancient_eras.description: Samurai armor, shoji houses, mountain castles, cherry blossoms over misty rice fields.

ancient_eras.name: Imperial China (Han/Tang)
ancient_eras.description: Silk robes, dragon motifs, scholar gardens, lantern-lit markets, sweeping tiled rooftops.

ancient_eras.name: Medieval Europe
ancient_eras.description: Stone keeps, chainmail, timber villages, banners over cobbled courtyards, candlelit halls.

ancient_eras.name: Viking Age Scandinavia
ancient_eras.description: Longships, runestones, fur cloaks, wooden stave churches, fjord mists and northern lights.

ancient_eras.name: Pre-Columbian Aztec/Maya
ancient_eras.description: Stepped pyramids, jade masks, intricate glyphs, jungle plazas with incense and vivid textiles.

ancient_eras.name: Ancient India (Maurya/Gupta)
ancient_eras.description: Carved stone stupas, lotus motifs, ornate jewelry, scholars under banyan trees, incense-scented courts.

ancient_eras.name: Persian Empire
ancient_eras.description: Grand palaces, relief carvings, lamassu guardians, royal processions, lush gardens and tiled halls.

ancient_eras.name: Mesopotamian Sumer/Babylon
ancient_eras.description: Ziggurats, baked clay bricks, cuneiform tablets, river barges, braided beards and woven robes.

ancient_eras.name: Bronze Age Mediterranean
ancient_eras.description: Bronze helms and shields, coastal trade ships, frescoed palaces, vibrant dyes and pottery.

ancient_eras.name: Iron Age Celtic
ancient_eras.description: Hillforts, spiral metalwork, tartan cloaks, stone circles, warriors with torcs and round shields.

ancient_eras.name: Golden Age of Islam
ancient_eras.description: Courtyard libraries, star-patterned tiles, astrolabes, scholars debating under colonnades, calligraphy.

ancient_eras.name: Victorian Era Industrial
ancient_eras.description: Steam trains, soot-streaked brick factories, gas lamps, waistcoats and top hats, wrought iron arches.

ancient_eras.name: Wild West Frontier
ancient_eras.description: Dusty main streets, wooden saloons, cowboy gear, railheads, sun-baked mesas and open sky.

ancient_eras.name: Roaring 20s Art Deco
ancient_eras.description: Jazz-age city nightlife, geometric gold accents, flapper dresses, chrome elevators, sleek skyscrapers.

mythological_elements.name: Norse Mythology
mythological_elements.description: Runes, Yggdrasil, ravens and wolves, Valkyries, storm-forged weapons and frost giants.

mythological_elements.name: Greek Mythology
mythological_elements.description: Olympian gods, marble temples, heroic demigods, monsters like hydras and gorgons, laurel and lightning.

mythological_elements.name: Egyptian Mythology
mythological_elements.description: Anubis and Ra, hieroglyphic spells, scarabs, solar barges, afterlife judgment halls, desert dusk.

mythological_elements.name: Japanese Yokai & Shinto Spirits
mythological_elements.description: Fox spirits, lantern festivals, shrine gates, river kami, ethereal masks and whispering forests.

mythological_elements.name: Chinese Mythology
mythological_elements.description: Dragons and phoenixes, immortals on cloud peaks, jade palaces, peach blossoms and celestial courts.

mythological_elements.name: Hindu Mythology
mythological_elements.description: Avatars and devas, luminous auras, lotus thrones, celestial weapons, cosmic dance and sacred rivers.

mythological_elements.name: Celtic Folklore
mythological_elements.description: Fae mounds, druids, green-cloaked spirits, knotwork charms, misty moors with standing stones.

mythological_elements.name: West African Mythology
mythological_elements.description: Orishas and ancestral spirits, vibrant textiles, drums and cowrie motifs, river and storm personifications.

mythological_elements.name: Aztec/Mayan Mythology
mythological_elements.description: Feathered serpents, jaguar warriors, obsidian blades, sacred cenotes, sun temples carved in stone.

mythological_elements.name: Polynesian Mythology
mythological_elements.description: Ocean spirits, voyaging canoes, tiki carvings, volcanic peaks, tattoos with swirling wave patterns.

mythological_elements.name: Slavic Folklore
mythological_elements.description: Baba Yaga huts on chicken legs, forest Leshy, carved talismans, birch groves veiled in fog.

mythological_elements.name: Lovecraftian Cosmic Horror
mythological_elements.description: Eldritch geometries, abyssal entities, inscrutable runes, creeping dread under starless skies.

mythological_elements.name: Biblical/Angelic Imagery
mythological_elements.description: Winged seraphim, radiant halos, prophetic scrolls, cathedral light beams, trumpets and burning wheels.

mythological_elements.name: Grimm's Fairy Tales
mythological_elements.description: Dark forests, crooked cottages, witches and wolves, red cloaks, cobblestone villages lit by lanterns.

mythological_elements.name: Arthurian Legend
mythological_elements.description: Knights of the Round Table, misty Avalon, enchanted swords, heraldic banners, moody moors and castles.

mythological_elements.name: Cybernetic/Techno-Mythology
mythological_elements.description: Digital pantheons, chrome totems, neon sigils, circuit halos, machine spirits woven into code.

photographic_and_cinematic.name: Photorealistic (8k, RAW)
photographic_and_cinematic.description: Photoreal capture: natural skin/fabric texture, realistic lens behavior, RAW photo detail, high dynamic range, believable lighting.

photographic_and_cinematic.name: Photorealistic Studio Portrait
photographic_and_cinematic.description: High-end portrait photography look: controlled softboxes, catchlights in eyes, sharp focus on face, shallow depth of field, true-to-life skin texture.

photographic_and_cinematic.name: Cinematic HDR Realism
photographic_and_cinematic.description: Filmic realism with rich dynamic range: moody key light, detailed shadows, subtle bloom, calibrated color grade, believable materials.

photographic_and_cinematic.name: Documentary Street Photography
photographic_and_cinematic.description: Candid street capture: natural light, gritty textures, slight motion blur, muted colors, honest everyday framing.

photographic_and_cinematic.name: Classic Film Noir
photographic_and_cinematic.description: Black-and-white noir lighting: hard key, Venetian blind shadows, deep contrast, smoke and rain atmosphere, dramatic angles.

photographic_and_cinematic.name: 35mm Film Grain
photographic_and_cinematic.description: Analog film look: fine grain, gentle halation, subtle color shifts, cinematic contrast, slight softness and authentic film texture.

photographic_and_cinematic.name: Polaroid Vintage
photographic_and_cinematic.description: Instant film aesthetic: soft focus, faded colors, vignette, slight exposure quirks, nostalgic snapshot vibe.

photographic_and_cinematic.name: CCTV/Security Footage
photographic_and_cinematic.description: Surveillance look: wide angle, timestamp overlay feel, low light noise, compression artifacts, flat or harsh lighting, utilitarian framing.

photographic_and_cinematic.name: VHS Tape Distortion
photographic_and_cinematic.description: Retro VHS: scanlines, tracking noise, chroma bleed, timecode vibe, washed colors, analog glitches and warping.

photographic_and_cinematic.name: Digital Matte Painting
photographic_and_cinematic.description: Cinematic environment art with realistic lighting, epic scale, atmospheric perspective, photobash-inspired texture and detail.

photographic_and_cinematic.name: Concept Art (ArtStation)
photographic_and_cinematic.description: High-detail concept art: dramatic lighting, realistic materials, sharp silhouettes, production-design polish, painterly yet precise.

comic_and_cartoon.name: Anime Cel-Shaded
comic_and_cartoon.description: Japanese animation look: clean line art, flat vibrant colors, cel shading, crisp highlights, simplified textures, expressive faces.

comic_and_cartoon.name: Manga Inked Illustration
comic_and_cartoon.description: Black-and-white ink drawing with screentones, cross-hatching, speed lines, bold outlines, manga panel energy.

comic_and_cartoon.name: Webcomic Style
comic_and_cartoon.description: Panel-ready webcomic look: clean readable lineart, flat or simple shading, clear silhouettes, space for text balloons, punchy expressions.

comic_and_cartoon.name: Webtoon / Manhwa Style
comic_and_cartoon.description: Korean webtoon/manhwa look: clean lines, smooth gradient shading, glossy eyes, soft lighting, pastel or vivid palette, vertical-scroll composition cues.

comic_and_cartoon.name: Western Comic Book Style
comic_and_cartoon.description: Bold outlines, dynamic poses, dramatic perspective, halftone dots, strong inking, punchy color separation like printed comics.

comic_and_cartoon.name: Cartoon Network Style
comic_and_cartoon.description: Simplified shapes, thick clean outlines, flat colors, exaggerated expressions, minimal shading, TV animation character design.

comic_and_cartoon.name: Studio Ghibli Style
comic_and_cartoon.description: Whimsical hand-drawn anime film vibe: warm painterly backgrounds, soft natural lighting, gentle colors, storybook realism.

comic_and_cartoon.name: Disney/Pixar 3D Style
comic_and_cartoon.description: Family-friendly 3D animation look: smooth stylized forms, clean materials, soft global illumination, expressive faces, cinematic lighting.

comic_and_cartoon.name: American Comic (Silver Age)
comic_and_cartoon.description: Vintage superhero comic vibe: flat spot colors, bold inking, halftone dots, dynamic poses, dramatic captions.

comic_and_cartoon.name: Franco-Belgian Bande Dessinee
comic_and_cartoon.description: European comic clarity: clean lines, balanced color flats, clear panel composition, characterful yet readable stylization.

comic_and_cartoon.name: Ligne Claire (Tintin Style)
comic_and_cartoon.description: Even line weights, minimal shading, solid color fills, crisp silhouettes, graphic readability and tidy contours.

comic_and_cartoon.name: Pop Art Ben-Day Dots
comic_and_cartoon.description: Bold pop art poster: ben-day dot shading, thick black outlines, primary colors, speech bubble flair, graphic repetition.

comic_and_cartoon.name: Graphic Novel Noir Ink
comic_and_cartoon.description: Heavy chiaroscuro inks, angular silhouettes, rain-slick streets, sparse color accents, moody detective comic energy.

comic_and_cartoon.name: Blood Moon Horror Comic
comic_and_cartoon.description: Graphic novel horror: high-contrast inks, crimson accents, rain-slick alleys, sharp panel angles, visceral motion lines.

comic_and_cartoon.name: Stop-Motion/Claymation
comic_and_cartoon.description: Handmade stop-motion: clay/plasticine texture, imperfect fingerprints, miniature sets, frame-by-frame charm, soft practical lighting.

traditional_and_fine_art.name: Storybook Watercolor
traditional_and_fine_art.description: Watercolor washes, soft edges, paper texture, gentle gradients, illustrative storybook charm with light linework.

traditional_and_fine_art.name: Oil Painting (Chiaroscuro)
traditional_and_fine_art.description: Classical oil painting with dramatic light/dark contrast, rich brush strokes, deep shadows, warm highlights, museum-like realism.

traditional_and_fine_art.name: Impressionist Painting
traditional_and_fine_art.description: Loose visible brush strokes, broken color, soft forms, atmospheric light, painterly texture, outdoor luminosity.

traditional_and_fine_art.name: Abstract Expressionism
traditional_and_fine_art.description: Expressive abstract marks, energetic brushwork, splatters, bold color fields, emotional composition over literal detail.

traditional_and_fine_art.name: Ink Wash (Sumi-e)
traditional_and_fine_art.description: East Asian ink wash: fluid brush strokes, soft gradients, ample negative space, rice paper texture, poetic minimalism.

traditional_and_fine_art.name: Nihonga Inspired
traditional_and_fine_art.description: Modern Japanese painting: mineral pigments, gold/silver accents, layered washes, graceful linework, nature motifs.

traditional_and_fine_art.name: Chinese Gongbi Brush Painting
traditional_and_fine_art.description: Meticulous line-driven Chinese painting: fine outlines, delicate shading, traditional flora/fauna themes, silk/paper texture.

traditional_and_fine_art.name: Korean Minhwa Folk Art
traditional_and_fine_art.description: Vivid folk motifs: flattened perspective, lucky animals, decorative patterns, warm earth tones, storytelling symbolism.

traditional_and_fine_art.name: Indian Mughal Miniature
traditional_and_fine_art.description: Intricate miniature painting: jewel tones, fine outlines, ornate textiles, architectural frames, detailed courtly scenes.

traditional_and_fine_art.name: Persian Miniature Illumination
traditional_and_fine_art.description: Lavish manuscript style: dense ornament, ultramarine and gold, flattened perspective, floral borders, narrative vignettes.

traditional_and_fine_art.name: Byzantine Icon Painting
traditional_and_fine_art.description: Gold leaf backgrounds, frontal figures, stylized folds, sacred calm expressions, tempera texture, haloed composition.

traditional_and_fine_art.name: Celtic Illuminated Manuscript
traditional_and_fine_art.description: Interlaced knotwork, ornate initials, marginal beasts, parchment texture, jewel-toned inks, medieval scriptorium feel.

traditional_and_fine_art.name: Mexican Muralism (Rivera Style)
traditional_and_fine_art.description: Monumental mural look: bold figurative forms, earthy saturated palette, social narrative scenes, fresco texture.

traditional_and_fine_art.name: Celestial Myth Fresco
traditional_and_fine_art.description: Ancient mural vibe: cracked plaster texture, muted mineral pigments, haloed demigods, starry motifs and flowing robes.

traditional_and_fine_art.name: Watercolor Urban Sketch
traditional_and_fine_art.description: Loose on-location sketch: pen outlines with quick washes, gestural perspective, lively street details, paper texture.

graphic_and_printmaking.name: Soviet Constructivist Poster
graphic_and_printmaking.description: Bold geometric shapes, strong diagonals, limited palette (red/black/cream), graphic typography, propaganda-poster composition.

graphic_and_printmaking.name: Russian Propaganda Art
graphic_and_printmaking.description: Heroic poster illustration with dramatic lighting, simplified forms, patriotic color palette, high-contrast graphic look.

graphic_and_printmaking.name: Vintage Pulp Magazine Cover
graphic_and_printmaking.description: Mid-century pulp cover: bold painted illustration, dramatic scene, saturated colors, stylized typography space, slightly aged print texture.

graphic_and_printmaking.name: Art Nouveau (Mucha Style)
graphic_and_printmaking.description: Ornamental flowing lines, floral motifs, decorative borders, elegant poster composition, muted yet rich palette, stylized figures.

graphic_and_printmaking.name: Modern Geometric Flat Vector
graphic_and_printmaking.description: Clean vector aesthetics, simplified geometric forms and shapes, vibrant pastel and neon gradients, frameless flat design, smooth color blocking, modern minimalist composition.

graphic_and_printmaking.name: Art Deco (Geometric)
graphic_and_printmaking.description: Clean geometric shapes, symmetry, metallic accents, bold patterns, luxury poster vibe, streamlined architecture motifs.

graphic_and_printmaking.name: Bauhaus Design
graphic_and_printmaking.description: Minimal functional design: primary colors, circles/triangles, grid composition, modernist typography feel, uncluttered shapes.

graphic_and_printmaking.name: Surrealist Collage
graphic_and_printmaking.description: Dreamlike collage: cut-paper layers, unexpected juxtapositions, mixed-media textures, uncanny scale shifts, photomontage vibe.

graphic_and_printmaking.name: Ukiyo-e Woodblock Print
graphic_and_printmaking.description: Traditional Japanese woodblock print: flat colors, bold contour lines, patterned textiles, stylized waves/clouds, paper texture.

graphic_and_printmaking.name: Risograph Print
graphic_and_printmaking.description: Riso print: limited spot colors, misregistration offsets, grainy ink texture, halftone patterns, zine-like aesthetic.

graphic_and_printmaking.name: Linocut/Woodcut
graphic_and_printmaking.description: Relief print look: carved high-contrast lines, rough texture, bold shapes, minimal colors, tactile ink impression.

graphic_and_printmaking.name: Charcoal Sketch
graphic_and_printmaking.description: Charcoal drawing: smudged shading, soft edges, expressive strokes, paper grain, high-contrast sketch realism.

graphic_and_printmaking.name: Pencil Sketch
graphic_and_printmaking.description: Graphite pencil lines, light cross-hatching, sketchbook texture, unfinished illustrative feel, subtle shading.

graphic_and_printmaking.name: Graffiti/Street Art
graphic_and_printmaking.description: Urban street art: spray paint texture, bold tags, drips, stencil elements, vibrant color pops, gritty wall backdrop vibe.

graphic_and_printmaking.name: Contemporary Mixed-Media Collage
graphic_and_printmaking.description: Layered cutouts, scanned textures, torn paper edges, paint splashes, type fragments, playful hybrid composition.

graphic_and_printmaking.name: Brutalist Architectural Illustration
graphic_and_printmaking.description: Concrete-heavy forms: stark geometry, hard edges, muted grays, sharp shadows, utilitarian monumentality.

graphic_and_printmaking.name: Andean Textile Inspired
graphic_and_printmaking.description: Geometric woven motifs: stepped diamonds, llamas/condors, vibrant stripes, hand-loomed texture, highland color harmony.

graphic_and_printmaking.name: Aboriginal Dot Painting
graphic_and_printmaking.description: Pointillist patterns: concentric circles, earthy ochres, symbolic pathways, rhythmic dot clusters on dark ground.

graphic_and_printmaking.name: Ottoman Iznik Tile Pattern
graphic_and_printmaking.description: Ceramic arabesques: cobalt and turquoise florals, repeating medallions, crisp white glaze, symmetrical ornamental grids.

graphic_and_printmaking.name: Ethiopian Iconography
graphic_and_printmaking.description: Flat vivid color fields, almond eyes, haloed saints, patterned borders, devotional composition on wood panel texture.

stylized_and_aesthetic.name: Corporate Memphis (Alegria)
stylized_and_aesthetic.description: Flat vector illustration with clean geometric shapes, stylized characters with non-traditional features (blue hair, exaggerated proportions), pastel palette with muted blues and soft pinks, low-contrast tones, minimalist design, flat shading with no gradients, soft ambient glow, clean outlines, solid colors, matte finish, lo-fi aesthetic, abstract geometric urban backgrounds, serene whimsical modern vibe.

stylized_and_aesthetic.name: Neon Noir/Synthwave
stylized_and_aesthetic.description: Retro synthwave: neon gradients, magenta/cyan palette, glossy reflections, dark silhouettes, 80s noir mood, glowing rim light.

stylized_and_aesthetic.name: Low-Poly 3D Render
stylized_and_aesthetic.description: Geometric low-poly forms, faceted surfaces, simple shaders, clean lighting, minimal textures, stylized 3D scene.

stylized_and_aesthetic.name: Pixel Art (16-bit)
stylized_and_aesthetic.description: Retro 16-bit pixel art: crisp pixel clusters, limited palette, dithering, sprite-like shapes, game UI sensibility.

stylized_and_aesthetic.name: Retro Futurism (Atompunk)
stylized_and_aesthetic.description: 1950s sci-fi optimism: chrome fins, rayguns, teal and orange plastics, optimistic space age posters, mid-century typography.

stylized_and_aesthetic.name: Vaporwave Pastel
stylized_and_aesthetic.description: Surreal pastel gradients, retro grids, marble busts, glitchy VHS overlays, nostalgic 80s digital sunset mood.

fantasy_and_horror.name: Dark Fantasy Painterly
fantasy_and_horror.description: Moody oil-painted fantasy: dramatic chiaroscuro, battered armor, arcane sigils, stormy skies, embers and mist.

fantasy_and_horror.name: Grimdark Realism
fantasy_and_horror.description: Gritty low-fantasy: scarred warriors, mud and rust textures, muted palette, harsh light, war-torn ruins.

fantasy_and_horror.name: High Fantasy Luminescent
fantasy_and_horror.description: Glowing enchanted forests, crystalline magic, radiant runes, ethereal cloaks, jewel-toned palette with soft bloom.

fantasy_and_horror.name: Eldritch Horror Illustration
fantasy_and_horror.description: Ink-heavy cosmic dread: impossible geometry, tentacular silhouettes, grainy stippling, desaturated palette with sickly greens.

fantasy_and_horror.name: Gothic Horror Etching
fantasy_and_horror.description: Fine-line etch style: towering spires, wrought iron gates, candlelit interiors, heavy cross-hatching and deep shadows.

fantasy_and_horror.name: Victorian Gothic Lithograph
fantasy_and_horror.description: Antique print look: foggy gaslit streets, tailored coats, ornate frames, charcoal shading, subtle sepia tone.

fantasy_and_horror.name: Folk Horror Woodcut
fantasy_and_horror.description: Rough carved lines, rural rituals, straw masks, bonfire silhouettes, coarse ink texture and stark contrast.

fantasy_and_horror.name: Baroque Dark Fantasy
fantasy_and_horror.description: Opulent yet ominous: gilded armor, velvet drapery, chiaroscuro lighting, cathedral-scale compositions and ornate scrollwork.

fantasy_and_horror.name: Bioluminescent Fae Forest
fantasy_and_horror.description: Glow-dotted mushrooms, floating motes, translucent wings, mossy trunks, teal and violet night palette with soft haze.

fantasy_and_horror.name: Necromancer's Laboratory
fantasy_and_horror.description: Dusty arcane study: bone totems, green phials, candle wax drips, chained grimoires, cold rim lighting on stone.
